location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘British India S.N. Co. Ltd. M.S. Dwarka’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:89 x 138 mm.Condition:The postcard has two punch holes; one on the left-hand edge, the other on the right-hand edge.The postcard is housed in a clear plastic sleeve.

mods.abstract: Postcard showing a black-and-white photograph of the Dwarka(operated by the British India Steam Navigation Company Limited) at sea. The postcard was enclosed with a letter dated 1 November 1947, sent by the Bahrain office of the shipping agent Gray, Mackenzie & Company, to the Political Agent in Bahrain (f 56). The Dwarkaentered service in 1947, and operated between the Persian Gulf and India until 1982. The M.S. in the postcard’s caption stands for Motor Ship.
